survey_name: Electric Scooter Sharing Service Feedback Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather user feedback on the electric scooter sharing service to improve rider experience and service quality.

questions.question_text: How often do you use our electric scooter sharing service?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you use our electric scooter sharing service?

questions.question_text: What factors influence your choice of using our electric scooter sharing service? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice answers. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What factors influence your choice of using our electric scooter sharing service? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the condition and maintenance of our scooters?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the condition and maintenance of our scooters?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for our electric scooter sharing service?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for our electric scooter sharing service?
